FestivalPlanner.NPC

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.NPC.NPC

  • public class NPC
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for everything related to NPC instances, which can be seen in SimulatorCanvas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NPC

        public NPC(java.awt.geom.Point2D position,
           int spriteSheet)
        Constructor for the NPC class.

        Sets the position to the parameter's value, and sets the appearance of the NPC by cutting up the imagine designated to it.

        Parameters:
        position - changes this.position to the parameter's value
        spriteSheet - changes the appearance of the NPC in question

      • NPC

        public NPC(java.awt.geom.Point2D position,
           java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>> spriteSheets)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<NPC> NPCs)

      • handleCollision

        private void handleCollision(java.util.ArrayList<NPC> NPCs)

      • separateNPC

        private void separateNPC(NPC otherNPC)
        Moves the NPC away from the others to make sure no collisions are happening.

        It does this one by one; there can never be two NPCs moving at the same time. In order to do this we check the boolean isSeparating for every NPC in the list given as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        otherNPC - the NPC that has collision with this

      • updateDirectionToFace

        void updateDirectionToFace()
        Updates this NPC' direction to the direction it should face to walk straight forward to its' target.

      • walkOnAxis

        public void walkOnAxis()
        Updates the NPC' position to the current one, plus or minus the speed. This is dependent on the direction this NPC is facing.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(java.util.ArrayList<NPC> npcs)
        Returns a boolean, which is true if this NPC hits/enters another NPC' collider.
        Parameters:
        npcs - ArrayList of NPC instances to check
        Returns:
        boolean, whether the NPC hit another NPC instance

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)

      • drawImage

        private void drawImage(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> list,
                       java.awt.geom.AffineTransform tx)
        Draws the NPC-sprite/character on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics2D-canvas to draw on
        list - ArrayList containing images of the direction's walk-cycle
        tx - AffineTransform which values will be used for positioning the image

      • listOfDirection

        @Nullable
private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> listOfDirection()
        Returns an ArrayList containing the images for the direction this NPC is facing.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing images of the NPC' direction

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(java.awt.geom.Point2D newTarget)
        Sets a target/destination for this NPC to move to.

        Sets this.target to the parameter's value, which is an instance of Point2D.

        Parameters:
        newTarget - Point2D to travel to

      • debugDraw

        private void debugDraw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws a circle (resembling the collider), and a line (from the current position to the destination).

        Is only used for debugging purposes.

        Parameters:
        g2d - graphics2D to draw on
